Translations.Text: Blessed be He in whose hands is the dominion and He is Powerful over everything
He Who created death and this life that He try you as to which of you is fairer in action. And He is The Almighty, The Forgiving
Who created the seven heavens one on another? Thou hast not seen any imperfection in the creation of The Merciful. Then, return thy sight! Hast thou seen any flaw
Again, return thy sight twice again and thy sight will turn about to thee, one that is dazzled while it is weary
And, certainly, We made to appear pleasing the lower heaven with lamps and We assigned them things to stone satans. We made ready for them the punishment of the blaze
And for those who were ungrateful to their Lord is the punishment of hell. Miserable will be the Homecoming
When they were cast down into it, they would hear it sighing while it is boiling
and about to burst with rage. As often as a unit of them were cast down into it, the ones who are keepers there asked them: Approaches not a warner to you
They will say: Yea! A warner drew near us, but we denied him. And we said: God sent not down anything. You are not but in a great going astray
And they would say: If we had been hearing or are reasonable, we would not have been Companions of the Blaze
And they would acknowledge their impiety. Then, hell for the Companions of the Blaze
Truly, those who dread their Lord in the unseen, for them is forgiveness and a great compensation
